alert.note: Alert for Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:26AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bentonia affecting Madison and Yazoo Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River near Bentonia. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.5 feet, Agricultural land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning and continue rising to a crest of 24.0 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Black River Bentonia 22.0 21.8 Fri 8 am CST 22.6 23.5 24.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CST.
